TEXT.TITLE: YUGOSLAVIA FREEZING PRICES AFTER STRIKES
TEXT.BODY: The government said it will freeze prices at end-December levels within five days. The announcement followed a wave of strikes that swept the country in protest against a wages freeze. The government, in a statement through the official Tanjug news agency, said the freeze would affect food, consumer goods, tools, textiles and furniture and would last 90 days. REUTER
